definition: A term commonly employed to describe dirt, grime, or any kind of undesirable substance that may be present on surfaces or objects. It is frequently used to refer to the act of cleaning or removing such dirt, and is often associated with household chores or cleaning tasks.

examples.german: Der Schmutz auf dem Boden muss weggeputzt werden.
examples.english: The dirt on the floor needs to be cleaned up.

examples.german: Sie hat Schmutz auf ihrem Kleid.
examples.english: She has dirt on her dress.

examples.german: Der Schmutz in der Luft ist ungesund.
examples.english: The pollution in the air is unhealthy.

examples.german: Bitte entfernen Sie den Schmutz von den Fenstern.
examples.english: Please remove the dirt from the windows.

examples.german: Die Kinder spielen gerne im Schmutz.
examples.english: The children enjoy playing in the dirt.
